title: my draven build bc I need 2 more blue essence for 600 in order to get my first mastery 7 champion
body:
currently at 598 :( only 2 more to go for draven master 7 :) ill share my draven build

BT into SS or PD whichever is optimal at the moment. Then IE or LDR/MR if they have lots of armor. Another AS item if you went SS go RFC if you went PD go either. Make sure you have both IE and LDR/MR that this point. finish with ER if you want to sell your boots.

ign: Kloshers

replies.body: you could always use the tickets from the daily arcade quest.

>2 Blue essence.

Buy a random champion shard (1700 IP), and disenchant it. ;)
Aw you're really close!  We like to help where we can, but we aren't able to gift out essences.  Just keep playing and grab some mastery chests to get it!  Good luck!
